doc:
Larry Kert https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Larry_Kert 0 Larry Kert (born Lawrence Frederick Kurt; December 5, 1930 – June 5, 1991) was an American actor, singer, and dancer. He is best known for creating the role of Tony in the original Broadway version of West Side Story. Larry_Kert ( born Lawrence_Frederick_Kurt ; December_5_,_1930 – June_5_,_1991 ) was an_American_actor , singer , and dancer . He is_best_known for creating the_role of Tony in the_original_Broadway_version of West_Side_Story .
